frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-macbook-battery-percentage-corrector
frozen.shortDescription: Corrects only the battery percentage shown in the panel aggregate menu.
frozen.longDescription:
Corrects only the battery percentage shown in the panel aggregate menu.
Does not mess with UPower or other subsystems.
The battery percentage shown on MacBooks does not account for battery degradation. This extension corrects for this.
See https://mysorelug.indriyallc.net/articles/2021/06/writing-gnome-extension/index.html for more details.
